```js
const image = require("./16-9.jpg");

class TemporaryDrawerExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { open: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Button onClick={() => this.setState({ open: true })}>
          Open drawer
        </Button>

        <TemporaryDrawer
          open={this.state.open}
          onClose={() => this.setState({ open: false })}
        >
          <TemporaryDrawerHeader>
            <TemporaryDrawerHeaderContent
              style={{
                backgroundImage: `url(${image})`,
                backgroundSize: "cover"
              }}
            >
              <Theme text="text-primary-on-dark">Header content</Theme>
            </TemporaryDrawerHeaderContent>
          </TemporaryDrawerHeader>
          <TemporaryDrawerContent>
            <DrawerList>
              <DrawerListItem selected>
                <ListItemGraphic>
                  <Icon>inbox</Icon>
                </ListItemGraphic>Inbox
              </DrawerListItem>
              <DrawerListItem>
                <ListItemGraphic>
                  <Icon>star</Icon>
                </ListItemGraphic>Star
              </DrawerListItem>
              <DrawerListItem>
                <ListItemGraphic>
                  <Icon>send</Icon>
                </ListItemGraphic>
                Sent Mail
              </DrawerListItem>
              <Divider />
              <DrawerListItem>
                <ListItemGraphic>
                  <Icon>email</Icon>
                </ListItemGraphic>
                All Mail
              </DrawerListItem>
              <DrawerListItem>
                <ListItemGraphic>
                  <Icon>delete</Icon>
                </ListItemGraphic>
                Trash
              </DrawerListItem>
            </DrawerList>
          </TemporaryDrawerContent>
        </TemporaryDrawer>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<TemporaryDrawerExample />;
```
